ModuleDescription: The objective of this module is to develop the learning capabilities and hone the problem solving skills of talented students at a mathematically deeper and more rigorous level. The contents of this module will consist of those in the regular module (MA3111 Complex Analysis I) and the following additional topics: Casorati-Weierstrass Theorem, infinite products of analytic functions, normal families of analytic functions.
Prerequisite: (MA1104 or MA2104 or MA1507) and (MA3110 or MA3110S) and departmental approval
